content:
<rule id="3rd-party-03000" xmlns="http://windup.jboss.org/schema/jboss-ruleset">
            <when>
                <or>
                    <file filename="spring-boot{*}.jar"/>
                    <project>
                        <artifact artifactId="spring-boot" groupId="org.springframework"/>
                    </project>
                </or>
            </when>
            <perform>
                <iteration>
                    <when>
                        <not>
                            <file filename="spring-boot{*}test{*}.jar"/>
                        </not>
                    </when>
                    <perform>
                        <classification category-id="information" effort="0" title="Embedded framework - Spring Boot">
                            <description>The application embeds the Spring Boot framework.</description>
                        </classification>
                        <technology-tag level="INFORMATIONAL">Spring Boot</technology-tag>
                    </perform>
                </iteration>
            </perform>
        </rule>
